alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax; Nash; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 6:11PM EDT until May 09 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NASH...EDGECOMBE...SOUTHWESTERN HALIFAX AND NORTHEASTERN WILSON COUNTIES... At 608 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rocky Mount, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. The NWS Raleigh received a report of nickel-size hail covering the ground near the intersection of I-95 and Highway 64. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rocky Mount, Tarboro, Nashville, Elm City, Dortches, Red Oak, Princeville, Sharpsburg, Pinetops and Whitakers. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
